channel.title: Can't find the bitmap
channel.description:
Hey all
I heard about scar from a friend a few weeks ago and it seems like it could be useful to me. I will not be using it for Runescape, but for another online rpg.
Im having a problem with finding bitmaps in scar. To test, I am trying to find the firefox icon on my desktop.
I've cropped the icon down to a 5x5 pixel bmp
here is the code: [code]program New; var firefoxicon,x,y:integer; begin firefoxicon := BitmapFromString(5, 5, 'E0781880583838508040' + '78B04094C8D87018B03808A84018C06030483028D87018B84008D' + '06028E05800E8B470E07820E09C58F0D498E0D4A0507888E08C30' + 'E89438B09C70586868206898');
if(findbitmap(firefoxicon, x, y))then writeln('Found the Bitmap.') end.[/code]
Ive set the crosshairs to the desktop, but it's still not working!

item.title: Can't find the bitmap
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Make it so it’s unique, you don’t want something too common, or something too big in size.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't find the bitmap
item.dc:creator: @rhijaen rhijaen
item.description:
@rhijaen wrote:

hmm, silly me!

the bmp wasnt big enough?

i changed it to a 10x10 bmp and it works now…

how big exactly does it have to be?

Read full topic

item.title: Can't find the bitmap
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Try FindBitmapToleranceSpiral, seems a better bitmap procedure. Make sure you crop it and don’t resize it as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't find the bitmap
item.dc:creator: @rhijaen rhijaen
item.description:
@rhijaen wrote:

Hey all

I heard about scar from a friend a few weeks ago and it seems like it could be useful to me. I will not be using it for Runescape, but for another online rpg.

Im having a problem with finding bitmaps in scar. To test, I am trying to find the firefox icon on my desktop.

I’ve cropped the icon down to a 5x5 pixel bmp

here is the code:

[code]program New;
var
firefoxicon,x,y:integer;
begin
firefoxicon := BitmapFromString(5, 5, ‘E0781880583838508040’ +
‘78B04094C8D87018B03808A84018C06030483028D87018B84008D’ +
‘06028E05800E8B470E07820E09C58F0D498E0D4A0507888E08C30’ +
‘E89438B09C70586868206898’);

   if(findbitmap(firefoxicon, x, y))then
   writeln('Found the Bitmap.')

end.[/code]

Ive set the crosshairs to the desktop, but it’s still not working!

Read full topic
